short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Trello is a browser extension that enhances the Trello experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your Trello boards to the next level with Better Trello, the must-have browser extension that enhances your productivity and streamlines your workflow. Here’s what Better Trello offers:

With Better Trello, you can:

📊 View larger cards: Get more information at a glance with expanded card views.
🆔 See card IDs instantly: Reference card IDs directly on the card—perfect for quick lookups.
📋 Wider lists: No more cramped views—expand your lists for a better overview.
✍️ Use the classic Markdown editor: Ditch the WYSIWYG editor and go back to the legacy Markdown experience you love.
🛠️ Hide the top bar: Clear up your workspace and focus on what matters.
➕ Add to Trello button: Easily add any website as a card to your board with one click.
⌨️ Disable native keyboard shortcuts: Avoid accidental changes by turning off Trello’s default keyboard shortcuts.
🔢 List card count: Quickly see how many cards are in each list for better task management.

Better Trello is the ultimate tool for Trello power users, offering the flexibility and features you need to stay organized and efficient.

Contribute to this extension via GitHub:
https://github.com/migteam/better-trello-browser-extension
